oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Major Ridge portrait
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Color portrait of Major Ridge. Portrait from shoulders up. He wears a blue coat, brown vest, black necktie, and white color. He has short, white hair.
Fought with the U.S. during the War of 1812. Reluctantly supported Indian removal in the 1830's, after initially opposing it.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Ridge, Major, approximately 1771-1839
Indians of North America; Cherokee Indians--History; Cherokee Indians; Indians of North America--History; Indians of North America--Portraits
